Build-Depends: dpkg-dev (>= 1.22.5), debhelper-compat (= 13), architecture-is-64-bit, dh-sequence-python3, chrpath, flex, bison, libfl-dev, python3-all-dev, cython3, python3-setuptools, python3-sphinx, python3-sphinx-rtd-theme, python3-recommonmark, libpsm-infinipath1-dev [amd64 i386], libucx-dev [amd64 arm64 ppc64el], libpsm2-dev [amd64], libcurl4-gnutls-dev | libcurl-dev, libhwloc-dev, zlib1g-dev, libevent-dev, libjansson-dev, libltdl-dev, libmunge-dev [!hurd-any]
Package-List: libpmix-bin deb net optional arch=any libpmix-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libpmix2t64 deb libs optional arch=any python3-pmix deb net optional arch=any
